channel.title: I have a problem with my 508 character files
channel.description: ok, i need some help with the character files on the few 508+ sources i have download, everything is in .dat (a dat file). And I have made those files into notepads and then changed to english (from japanese i think) and then i can't update them, i need to make myself owner, and its impossible for me to do when i can't update the files, and it keeps reseting my account if i try. So If somebody could help that would be awesome. Thanks.
